import numpy as np 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd 
import sympy

xs = np.linspace (10,50)  

plt.title("y = 5x") 
plt.xlabel("xaxis")  
plt.ylabel("yaxis")
plt.plot(xs,5 * xs)

plt.savefig("y = 5x.svg")

df  = pd.DataFrame(np.array([xs, 5*xs]).
df.columns = ['x','y']

x,y = sympy.symbols("x y")
sympy.Eq(y, 2*x)
